column5: Let see if i got a picture on my profile.....
well on your profile there is a nice pic of a fat walleye there...  and yes it worked you have a picture there as well
hey fishindevil..... i saw that pic to..... put can't get one in my avitar....... I will keep trying ....... I guess i got to make it smaller.......?
Northwood, I had to go to photobucket and upload my avitar pic there then transfer it over to this board and use it as my avitar..That worked for me at the time....  Good Luck !!
I will give it a try.......muskistud  I see the pic in the profile and the album...... but i will work on the avatar......
Musky   How did you get Pic from photo bucket to yout "Avatar"?????
I took a pic and loaded it into paint. I then reduced the size under stretch and skew %.then saved it to desktop and loaded it up. Worked fine.
Very nice looking 'eye there.   Got any more pics .... practice makes perfect they say?
